app_descript:
Azar: Connect Across Borders

Brief:

Azar is an innovative app designed to break down geographical barriers and enrich your social life by connecting you with people across the globe through live video calls. Whether you're looking to explore new cultures or forge international friendships, Azar offers an effortless platform to spark conversations with just a swipe.
